Package: de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.util.resolver

[Groovy] Class ZipFileResolver

    • de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.util.resolver.ZipFileResolver
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      URIResolver

      @Log4j
//@TypeChecked
@CompileStatic
class ZipFileResolver
extends Object

      A resolver to get the contents of a zip file, used to transform contents of ODF files.

      Authors:
      cmahnke
